text: The Art of Fiction is the debut full-length album by rock band Avion Roe which was released on May 3, 2011. The album was self-recorded and co-produced by Geoff Rockwell. The lineup for this album consists of band members Evan Couture, Josh Cutlip, Sean Humphrey and Jordan Modro. ==Track listing== All songs written by Avion Roe ==Personnel== * Evan Couture – vocals * Sean Humphrey – bass * Jordan Modro – guitar * Josh Cutlip – drums ==References== Category:Avion Roe albums Category:2011 debut albums
title: The Art of Fiction (album)
